definition: to repeat a year in school
to leave (a message etc)/to retain/to stay/to remain/to keep/to preserve

sentences.english: She also thinks that it would help decrease the amount of students who fail every year.
sentences.chinese: 她认为这可以减少每年留级的学生数量。

sentences.english: If he failed in the exam again, he would be kept down next term.
sentences.chinese: 如果他考试再不及格，下学期他就得留级。

sentences.english: He was held back a year and still winces if anyone mentions it.
sentences.chinese: 他留级一年，如果有人提到这事他仍然畏畏缩缩。

sentences.english: If you fail your examination,you will be put back a whole year.
sentences.chinese: 如果你考试不及格，你就会留级一年。

sentences.english: Let your repeater is to let you try, you think you are still small, do?
sentences.chinese: 让你留级是让你努力，你以为你现在还小吗？

sentences.english: He flunked 6th grade and had take classes again.
sentences.chinese: 他六年级留级了，必须重新修课。

sentences.english: My patient didn't have to repeat his grade.
sentences.chinese: 我的小病人最终也没有留级。

sentences.english: His marks are so poor that he will have to be graded down.
sentences.chinese: 他各科成绩太差，他必须留级。

sentences.english: After her teacher warned her that she might fail, Sue began to buckle down to her studies.
sentences.chinese: 自从老师警告她可能留级之后，苏开始努力学习。

sentences.english: I'm afraid I would not graduate if I stayed down again.
sentences.chinese: 如果我再留级，我担心我毕不了业了。

definition: (of an audio device) to repeat a recorded phrase (e.g. for language learning)
to return to the same school and repeat a course from which one has already graduated, as a result of failing to get good enough results to progress to one's desired higher-level school
to change schools/to transfer to another college
to postpone one's graduation (e.g. by undertaking additional studies) (abbr. for 延後畢業|延后毕业[yan2 hou4 bi4 ye4])
to sit for a makeup exam/to resit an exam/makeup exam/resit
student who repeats (a course, grade etc) at school
to return to school (after an interruption)/to resume one's studies
